name: sudo-self source
subtitle: Custom iOS apps by sudo-self.
description: Welcome to the official sudo-self AltStore source. Stay tuned for exclusive iOS apps.

apps.name: SuperMario64
apps.subtitle: The N64 classic, now on iOS
apps.localizedDescription: A faithful port of Super Mario 64, rebuilt for iOS devices. Requires a device with an A9 chip or newer.

versions.localizedDescription: Initial port. Smooth performance on supported devices.
